title: another bugsplat error
body: while i was in ranked loading screen i got bugsplat error . i logged in after that and when i started reconnecting it did bugsplat error again and again. because of that i got leaverbuster 20 mins now what do i do//????

replies.body: Sorry to hear that happened just after champ select.  :/  This bugspalt can happen if a game file or driver failed to render your game.  We aren't able to remove the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty, but I recommend going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this and prevent further occurrences.  Let me know if you have any questions!
